page.title: 19Lorna's day in Kettering
page.content: Lorna is 11 years old and lives in a council house situated on Kettering's Grange Estate. At home there is just Mum and Lorna's two brothers. Many of her friends are in a similar situation or have a step parent. She doesn't like her street much as there is too much rubbish about and many people do not look after their houses too well. Her school day begins at 7a.m. After breakfast her friend calls and together they go to school calling at Grange shops for sweets on the way. She gets 55p pocket money each week. School is Â£all right' and so are the children and staff. She doesn't like using the school computer! At the end of school she often dawdles home. In the evening she may play with a friend or most likely watch T.V. or a video film. Bed is 10p.m. or later!
